members.description: The presentation model for the list.
The item renderer to use for data items. The class must implement the IDataRenderer interface. If defined, the itemRendererFunction property takes precedence over this property.

Function that returns an item renderer IFactory for a specific item. You should define an item renderer function similar to this sample function: 
\n function myItemRendererFunction(item:Object):IFactory

The data provider for this DataGroup. It must be an IList.

There are several IList implementations included in the Flex framework, including ArrayCollection, ArrayList, and XMLListCollection.

events.description: Dispatched when a renderer is added to this dataGroup. event.renderer is the renderer that was added.
